title._content: Image taken from page 280 of 'The History and Antiquities of Boston, the capital of Massachusetts ... from its settlement in 1630 to the year 1770. Also an introductory history to the discovery and settlement of New England ... Second edition'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The History and Antiquities of Boston, the capital of Massachusetts ... from its settlement in 1630 to the year 1770. Also an introductory history to the discovery and settlement of New England ... Second edition" Author: DRAKE, Samuel Gardner. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.h.17."
